summary: While on a trip to Thailand, a successful American businessman tries to radically change his life. Back in New York, his wife and daughter find their relationship with their live-in Filipino maid changing around them. At the same time, in the Philippines, the maid's family struggles to deal with her absence.
cast: Gael García Bernal|Michelle Williams|Marife Necesito|Sophie Nyweide|Natthamonkarn Srinikornchot|Tom McCarthy|Jan David G. Nicdao|Martin de los Santos|Chiqui del Carmen|Perry Dizon|Joseph Mydell|Doña Croll|Caesar Kobb|Matthew James Ryder|Piromya Sootrak|Pasakorn Mahakanok|Thanita Nirna-Na-Nan|Ian Stevens|Rune Kippervik|Peter Tuinstra|Pennapa Udomsin|Ofelia Ruivivar|Attakorn Kauchat|Winai Kassikoon|Khomsak Yala|Shatshai Yala|Sama-Ann Kasikoon|Sunaa|Nigel Rogers|Raul Morit|Greg Schroeder|Tirso Sotelo|Mario Sumagui|Julie Ysla|Drew Ernst|Marilyn Cea|Michelle Collins|Sarah Marlow|Mehrnosh Sharivar|Rajfa Duzic|David Hagman|Thomas Forsberg|Bryan 'Buck' Glinski|Anita Sihlberg|Maurice Herbert|Zana Penjweni|Elmira Arikan|Blanche Ona|Tony Wedgwood|Elli|Deborah Fronko|Rudina Hatipi|Seth Mpundu
title: Mamut
